statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000 AND amount > 50.0;
DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND receiver_address = '0x123456789abcdef'
DELETE FROM transaction_anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Suspicious' AND detected_at >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM block_miners WHERE mining_pool = 'Example Mining Pool';
DELETE FROM transaction_participants WHERE role = 'sender' AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number < 100);
DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM address_history WHERE total_transactions > 500 AND total_amount_received < 5000;
